title: Hello World
description: Write a program that prints 'Hello World!' to the console.

title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Read two integers from input and print their sum.

title: Maximum of Three Numbers
description: Read three integers and print the maximum value among them.

title: Fenwick Tree Query
description: Implement a Fenwick Tree (Binary Indexed Tree) to count inversions in an array. Read n numbers and for each number, output how many smaller numbers appeared before it.

title: Even Numbers Step by 2
description: Print all even numbers from 0 to 100, incrementing by 2 each time.

title: Print Even Numbers from Array
description: Read n numbers and print only the even numbers in the order they appear in the input.
